paper_abstract: Numerical schemes for incompressible Navier-Stokes equations based on low Mach number limits of kinetic equations are presented. Discretizations of the incompressible Navier-Stokes equations are derived based on discretizations of the Boltzmann equation and consideration for the low Mach number limit. In the incompressible Navier-Stokes limit the discretizations reduce to explicit high-order numerical schemes. Numerical results for several test cases and comparisons with other well-known approaches are also presented. (C) 2005 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Kinetic-based numerical schemes for incompressible Navier-Stokes equations
